alert.note: Alert for Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 26 at 7:41PM PST until February 27 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches with isolated accumulations up to 5 inches above 2000 feet. * WHERE...Coast Range of Northwest Oregon and Central Coast Range of Western Oregon. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 11 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Will likely see precipitation start off as rain or a rain-snow mix becoming all snow in the early morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon
